search-things
(equals): A Thing with a given thingId
(not equals): All Things with not the given Attribute Value
(greater than): All Things greater than the given Attribute Value
(greater equals): All Things greater equals the given Attribute Value
(less then): All Things less then the given Attribute Value
(less equals): All Things less equals the given Attribute Value
(in): List of Things with a List of  given thingIds
(like): A Thing with a partial given thingId

request.description:
Starts with = \*, 
Ends with = \*, 
Wildcard for one Char = ?,
Wildcard for many Chars = \*

item.name: (and): All Things with two given Attribute Values
(or): All Things with one of the two given Attributes Values or both
(not): All Things not greater than a given Attribute Values
(sort): All Things with a higher or equal Attribute Value than the given  sorted descending

request.description:
Sort ascending = +,
Sort descending = -,
Sort with two criterias: 
sort(+attributes/att1,-attributes/att2)

item.name: (limit): All Things with a higher or equal Attribute Value than the given  and among these the second ten elements
(sort&limit): All Things with a higher or equal Attribute Value than the given  sorted descending  and among these the second ten elements
